casebody.data:
Donnie L. GOINS and Jackie Knapp
v.
TIME WARNER CABLE SOUTHEAST, LLC and Wake Electric Membership Corporation d/b/a Wake Electric No. 103P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 24, 2018 Thomas M. Buckley, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Joshua D. Neighbors, Attorney at Law, for Time Warner Cable Southeast, LLC. H. Forest Horne, Huntington M. Willis, Attorneys at Law, Raleigh, for Goins, Donnie L., et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 5th of April 2018 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of October 2018."
